def test_if_dns_servers_are_reachable_on_(self, dut, tests_definitions): """Verifies DNS servers are reachable via ping

tops = tests_tools.TestOps(tests_definitions, TEST_SUITE, dut) dns_servers = tops.test_parameters["dns_servers"] dns_vrf = tops.test_parameters["dns_vrf"]
for dns_server in dns_servers: if dns_vrf: show_cmd = f"ping vrf {dns_vrf} ip {dns_server}" else: show_cmd = f"ping {dns_server}"

tops.output_msg += ( f"
On router |{tops.dut_name}|, verifying NTP " f"server reachability for |{dns_server}| is " f"|{tops.test_result}|.

" f"OUTPUT of |{show_cmd}| is :

{tops.show_cmd_txt}.
" )
tops.actual_results.append(tops.actual_output) tops.expected_results.append(tops.expected_output)
